mean_cn: n. 经销商，商人，（俚）毒贩
mean_en: a person whose business is buying and selling a particular product; a person who sells illegal drugs; the person who gives out the cards in a card game
sentence: The car dealer gave us a great deal on our new car.
sentence_trans: 买这辆新车时，汽车经销商给了我们很大的优惠。
word_etyma: deal生意 + er名词后缀：行为的主动者，做某事的人 → n.经销商，商人
